code: import React from'react';import{BarChart,Bar,LineChart,Line,PieChart,Pie,Cell,XAxis,YAxis,CartesianGrid,Tooltip,Legend,ResponsiveContainer}from'recharts';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const COLORS=['#0088FE','#00C49F','#FFBB28','#FF8042','#8884D8'];const ChartRenderer=_ref=>{let{type,data,title,config={}}=_ref;const renderChart=()=>{switch(type){case'bar':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(BarChart,{data:data,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CartesianGrid,{strokeDasharray:"3 3"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(XAxis,{dataKey:config.xKey||'name'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(YAxis,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tooltip,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Legend,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Bar,{dataKey:config.yKey||'value',fill:"#0088FE"})]});case'line':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(LineChart,{data:data,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CartesianGrid,{strokeDasharray:"3 3"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(XAxis,{dataKey:config.xKey||'name'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(YAxis,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Legend,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Line,{type:"monotone",dataKey:config.yKey||'value',stroke:"#8884d8",strokeWidth:2})]});case'pie':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(PieChart,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Pie,{data:data,cx:"50%",cy:"50%",labelLine:false,label:_ref2=>{let{name,percent}=_ref2;return"".concat(name," ").concat((percent*100).toFixed(0),"%");},outerRadius:80,fill:"#8884d8",dataKey:config.valueKey||'value',children:data.map((entry,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Cell,{fill:COLORS[index%COLORS.length]},"cell-".concat(index)))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tooltip,{})]});default:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Unsupported chart type"});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white dark:bg-gray-800 rounded-lg p-4 border border-gray-200 dark:border-gray-600 my-4",children:[title&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-lg font-semibold text-gray-900 dark:text-gray-100 mb-4",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ResponsiveContainer,{width:"100%",height:300,children:renderChart()})]});};export default ChartRenderer;
